title: Seller Management System â€“ Mandatory shadcn/ui Refactor
description: This PRD defines a mandatory UI refactor for the existing internal Seller Management System. All existing functionality is correct and must remain unchanged. The sole objective is to replace all existing UI elements with shadcn/ui components and achieve a consistent, visually polished internal interface.
hard_rules: All buttons must use shadcn/ui Button component
All forms must use shadcn/ui Form system
All inputs must use shadcn/ui Input, Select, or Textarea components
All tables and lists must use shadcn/ui Table components
All dialogs, modals, and popovers must use shadcn/ui Dialog, Sheet, or Popover components
Native HTML elements (button, input, select, textarea, table) must not be used directly in the UI
Custom-styled components are not allowed unless wrapped around shadcn/ui primitives

requirements: Replace existing seller list UI with shadcn/ui Table
Use Badge for seller status or tags
Use Button for all row actions
Render document links using Button or Link variant
All forms must use shadcn/ui Form primitives
Optional fields must be visually indicated
Notes must be placed inside Card
Textarea must be used for all long-text input

ui_refactor_targets.notes: Login page now uses Alert component for error messages

visual_standards: Consistent padding and spacing using Tailwind utility classes recommended by shadcn
Neutral color palette with subtle accents
Clear typography hierarchy for headings, labels, and values
Hover and focus states must be visually clear and consistent

enforcement.code_review_rule: PRs introducing native HTML UI elements must be rejected
enforcement.acceptance_rule: UI changes are accepted only if all interactive elements are shadcn/ui-based

success_criteria: No native HTML UI elements are used directly in the UI
All screens visually conform to shadcn/ui design patterns
UI is visibly cleaner and more consistent than the previous version
